name: Skater Apocalypse
description:
Welcome to the ultimate battle between Skaters and the undead. The apocalypse is here and you are the lone skater sent to rescue the remaining people and other skateboarders. Smash and kill all the zombies in your way.
High action 3D environments with realistic fire and explosive effects. Skating simulation has never been more real and true. Huge skate ramps and plenty of walking zombies to smash.
The game includes both open map and mission mode. The skater can also smash cars, trucks, and other animals. Race around the city and complete the missions before time expires.
The 3D skate simulator with everything you would have wanted in a post apocalyptic setting. Take back the street and this extreme sim. Its epic.
